library(conflicted)
library(tidyverse)
library(rlang)
library(cowplot)

  c("xml2", "magrittr", "rlang", "dplyr", "readr", "purrr", "ggplot2")

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  tidy       = FALSE,
  cache      = FALSE,

  message    = FALSE,
  fig.height =     8,

  )

options(
  width = 80L,
  warn  = 1,
  mc.cores = parallel::detectCores()
  )

set.seed(42)

theme_set(theme_cowplot())
